portfolio_context.constraints_note: Tech sector at ~33% — still below 45% limit. Materials, Healthcare, and Financials underweight.

candidates.name: Lam Research Corp
candidates.catalyst: Strong 12‑1 return and high momentum percentile from Validea data.
candidates.fundamentals: Large‑cap semiconductor supplier benefiting from AI and wafer‑fab spending trends.
candidates.relative_strength: High momentum percentile and strong 12‑month returns.
candidates.rationale: Fits AI‑infrastructure theme; tech exposure still below 45% cap. High‑quality semicap name with strong multi‑month momentum.

candidates.name: Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd
candidates.catalyst: Gold sector strength; high multi‑month price momentum.
candidates.fundamentals: Large‑cap, strong cash flow miner with favorable commodity backdrop.
candidates.rationale: Diversifies portfolio further into Materials without breaching any cap.

candidates.name: Gold Fields Ltd (ADR)
candidates.catalyst: Significant multi‑month momentum surge driven by gold price strength.
candidates.fundamentals: Large miner with strong operating leverage to gold.
candidates.rationale: Adds materials exposure while avoiding sector over‑concentration elsewhere.

candidates.name: Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA (ADR)
candidates.momentum_12w: Over [Best Momentum Stocks to Buy for Nov. 25 - FINVIZ.com](https://finviz.com/news/238779/best-momentum-stocks-to-buy-for-nov-25)+110% (Validea 12‑1: +113.8%)
candidates.catalyst: Strong global bank performance, FX tailwinds, emerging‑market credit expansion.
candidates.fundamentals: Large‑cap diversified bank with improving profitability metrics.
candidates.rationale: Portfolio lacks Financials exposure; improves sector diversification.

candidates.name: Wheaton Precious Metals
candidates.catalyst: Estimate revisions up +8.8% over 60 days; strong Zacks momentum score (A).
candidates.fundamentals: Low‑cost streaming business with stable margins.
candidates.rationale: Non‑correlated diversifier with stable cash‑flow profile.

screening_summary.momentum_screen: 20 stocks with strong 4–12 week momentum signals
screening_summary.quality_screen: 10 stocks with large‑cap + clean fundamental trends
screening_summary.notes: Materials and Financials underweight in portfolio; selected candidates help diversify. Momentum derived from available multi‑month metrics when precise 4w/12w unavailable.
